study_title: Adjuvant Lapatinib and/or Trastuzumab for Early Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2-Positive Breast Cancer: Results From the Randomized Phase III Adjuvant Lapatinib and/or Trastuzumab Treatment Optimization Trial
table_title: Baseline Characteristics of the Patients, and Primary Tumors (Intention-to-Treat Groups)
description: Baseline characteristics of the intention-to-treat patient population across the four treatment arms of the study.
footnotes: Abbreviations: L+T, lapatinib plus trastuzumab; T→L, trastuzumab followed by lapatinib; L, lapatinib; T, trastuzumab; neodj. CT, neoadjuvant chemotherapy; AI, aromatase inhibitor; SERM, selective estrogen receptor modulator; LHRH, luteinizing hormone-releasing hormone.
*For the 266 patients receiving neoadjuvant chemotherapy, local laboratory results and were not enrolled within any particular treatment arm or included in any positive/negative result.
†For 104 patients, hormone receptor status was from a local laboratory.
